name: Braindead Ops
description:
Welcome to the eerie world of BraindeadOps, a  wave-based first-person shooter where you play as a fearless zombie hunter. 

As you fight your way through hordes of undead, you'll collect their brains, which you can convert into juice to buy perks and weapons. 

But be warned, each wave brings stronger and faster zombies that will test your survival skills and strategic thinking.

[wasd] Move

[space] Jump

[ctrl] Crouch

[x] hold to heal

[e] Interact

[r] Reload

[1/2] Switch weapons

[mouse] Look

[left/right click] Shoot/Aim
